column4: hello all, I'm running 12.04 and I'm not sure when exactly this started but now when ever I try to install a package via APT or Software Centre I get messages similar to this "WARNING: The following packages cannot be authenticated!"
I get that just trying to install pastebinit
Do you have some non-official site as your main repositories in sources.list perhaps?
I just did a bit of googleing and found I apparently don't have debian-keyring even installed, don't know how I fat fingered that but I'm fixing as we speak
